data.title: Mehr News Agency
data.text:
Iranian pres. condemns Israeli deadly strike on Gaza school

TEHRAN, Aug. 10 (MNA) – The new Iranian president Masoud Pezeshkian has condemned an Israeli regime's deadly strike on Gaza city's al-Tabeen school.

By: Arian Bahmani

Martyrdom anniversary of Hazrat Roghayeh (SA) held in Zanjan

ZANJAN, Aug. 10 (MNA) – The ceremony of martyrdom anniversary of Hazrat Roghayeh (SA), the youngest daughter of Imam Hussein (PBUH), was held at Islamabad District of Zanjan on Friday.

Mohammad Eslami retained as VP, Iran's nuclear chief

TEHRAN, Aug. 10 (MNA) – Iranian President Masoud Pezeshkian on Saturday reappointed Mohammad Eslami as vice president and head of the Atomic Energy Organization of Iran (AEOI).

Belarus demands Ukraine act against new airspace violations

TEHRAN, Aug. 10 (MNA) – Belarus' Foreign Ministry summoned the Ukrainian charge d'affaires on Saturday and told Kyiv to act against airspace violations after Belarusian President Alexander Lukashenko said a dozen Ukrainian drones had been destroyed.

VIDEO: Hezbollah drones spotted over occupied Palestine

TEHRAN, Aug. 10 (MNA) – Drones were spotted in the skies of occupied Palestine on Saturday that appeared to have been fired from Lebanon by Hezbollah Resistance movement.

Closing ceremony of 1st BRICS Simulation Conf. held

TEHRAN, Aug. 10 (MNA) – The closing ceremony of the First Simulation Conference of the BRICS Ministers was held in Tehran with the participation of Iran’s Minister of Economic Affairs and Finance (MEAF) Ehsan Khandouzi.

US to provide Israel with additional $3.5bn in military aid

TEHRAN, Aug. 10 (MNA) – The administration of President Joe Biden has announced plans to send an additional $3.5bn to Israel to spend on US-made weapons and military equipment amid the occupying regime’s months-long onslaught against Palestinians.

By: Ali Haddadi Asl

National Journalists’ Day observed at Mehr News Agency HQ

TEHRAN, Aug. 10 (MNA) – The National Journalists’ Day was commemorated at Mehr News Agency’s Headquarters in Tehran on Saturday with CEO of Mehr Media Group Mohammad Mehdi Rahmati touring the different departments.

Ukraine claims it hit an offshore gas platform used by Russia

TEHRAN, Aug. 10 (MNA) – Ukraine's navy and military intelligence have attacked and damaged a former offshore gas platform used by Russian forces in the Black Sea, the navy spokesman said on Saturday.

Iran shines at 1st Intl. Nuclear Science Olympiad

TEHRAN, Aug. 10 (MNA) – Iranian students excelled at the International Nuclear Science Olympiad (ISNO), held in the Philippines from August 1 to 6, bringing home a silver medal and three bronze medals

EU top diplomat 'horrified' by Gaza school strike

TEHRAN, Aug. 10 (MNA) – EU foreign policy chief Josep Borrell on Saturday expressed horror at a deadly strike by Israel on a school housing displaced people in Gaza.

VIDEO: Iran's Amouzad advances to Olympic semi-final

TEHRAN, Aug. 10 (MNA) – Iranian freestyle wrestler Rahman Amouzad on Saturday advanced to the 2024 Olympic Games semi-final by defeating his Albanian rival Islam Lechiyevich Dudaev in the weight category of 65 kg.

VIDEO: Taekwondoka Salimi reached Olympic semi-final

TEHRAN, Aug. 10 (MNA) – Arian Salimi, an Iranian Taekwondo practitioner advanced to the 2024 Paris Olympic Games semi-final by defeating his Mexican opponent on Saturday.

France beats Poland in final of Olympics volleyball

TEHRAN, Aug. 10 (MNA) – France is only the third country to win back-to-back golds in men’s volleyball after the former Soviet Union and the United States.

Gaza death toll exceeds 39,700 amid Israeli strike

TEHRAN, Aug. 10 (MNA) – The Palestinian Ministry of Health in the Gaza Strip put the number of the Palestinian people martyred in the Zionist regime's attacks on the Gaza Strip at 39,790.

Saudi Arabia condemns Israeli strike on Gaza school

TEHRAN, Aug. 10 (MNA) – Saudi Arabia has condemned the Israeli strike on a Gaza school sheltering displaced people that killed around 100 people on Saturday.

Arbaeen Pilgrimage 2024

Every year, millions of Shia Muslims and some people of other faiths from around the world take part in a special pilgrimage ritual, culminating in one of the world’s largest public gathering.

Violent rioter receives a 20-year prison sentence: report

TEHRAN, Aug. 10 (MNA) – One of the most dangerous defendants of January 06, 2021 riot, who attacked the US Capitol police officers with a weapon, was sentenced to 20 years in prison.

Iran-Armenia handicraft, tourism, culinary festival kicks off

TEHRAN, Aug. 10 (MNA) – The third edition of NAVASARD Festival started between Iran and Armenia themed “Culture, Tourism, Culinary, and Handicrafts”.

French president calls for Gaza ceasefire

TEHRAN, Aug. 10 (MNA) – French President Emmanuel Macron has reaffirmed France's support for a ceasefire in Gaza aimed at freeing all hostages, protecting Gazans, and delivering large-scale humanitarian aid, the Elysee Palace said on Friday.

Ansarullah:

Weakness of Arab world encourages Zionists to continue crime

TEHRAN, Aug. 10 (MNA) –The spokesman of Ansarullah and the head of Yemen's negotiating team, has emphasized that the weakness of Arab and Islamic countries encourages the Zionists to continue crimes in Gaza.

VIDEO: Iran's Amouzad defeats American rival in 2024 Olympics

TEHRAN, Aug. 10 (MNA) – Iranian freestyle wrestler Rahman Amouzad on Saturday defeated his American opponent Zain Retherford in the category of 65 kg in the 2024 Olympic Games.

Martyrdom anniversary of Hazrat Roghayeh (SA) held in Zanjan

ZANJAN, Aug. 10 (MNA) – The ceremony of martyrdom anniversary of Hazrat Roghayeh (SA), the youngest daughter of Imam Hussein (PBUH), was held at Islamabad District of Zanjan on Friday.
